description: Spearheaded the digital transformation initiative, leading a team of 12+ engineers in migrating legacy monolithic applications to microservices architecture. achievements: Led migration of 5+ enterprise applications to microservices, reducing system downtime by 80%

Improved code quality by implementing automated testing, increasing coverage to 85%

description: Built scalable APIs and robust backend systems for SaaS applications. Introduced agile practices and promoted a culture of continuous improvement across the engineering team.
